titles: A proclamation for adjourning the Parliament.
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William II)
publisher: Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, Printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty,
notes: Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh the fifteenth day of March, and of Our Reign the eighth year 1697.
Signed: Da. Moncreiff, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Adjourning the Parliament from "the eighteenth day of March instant to the eighteenth day of August next to come."
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
keywords: Scotland --  Politics and government --  1689-1745 --  Early works to 1800.
